app.title: Consonance Deck Builder
char_identity_10000979: The Endless: Special Contract Guard Crew Member
skill_description_12300020: Throws a Smoke Bomb, causing all enemies to lose their attack target for #r seconds.\nSmoke Bomb is considered Explosive.
skill_description_12300059: Strikes all enemies over 6 hits.\nIncreases this character's Attack by 1%. This effect stacks.\nThis card has Consonance: Its effect varies based on the color of the last card played.
skill_description_12300110: Unleashes a sword wave that <color=#FF6666>penetrates</color> enemies.\nDeals damage to all enemies once and <color=#FF6666>Slashes</color> them.\nThis sword wave is considered a Wave effect.
skill_description_12300304: Draws energy from nature, restoring #r Mana per second for #r seconds.
skill_leaderCardConditionDesc_12300025: Cooldown: 30 seconds. Whenever you use a Discard action, reduces the cooldown by 30 seconds. Whenever you play an Explosive card, reduces the cooldown by 5 seconds.
skill_description_12300106: Heals all frontline allies for #r of their Max HP.\nDraws all Magic Candy from your deck to your hand.
skill_description_12300164: Creates the environment Starlit Sky and <color=#7AB2FF>Purifies</color> all allies.\nReduces the cost of all cards by 1 for #r seconds.
skill_leaderCardConditionDesc_12300301: Cooldown: 25 seconds. Whenever this character's skill card is used, reduces the cooldown by 5 seconds.
skill_description_12300320: Makes the ground slippery and brandishes the twin hammers, dealing damage to enemies over 12 hits and <color=#7AB2FF>Chilling</color> them.\nAfter using the Ultimate, generates an Element Core: Frost in your hand.
skill_description_12300321: Breaks the ice wall and strikes the target over 3 hits. The damage per hit is determined by the remaining HP of the ice wall and <color=#7AB2FF>Chills</color> the target.\nThis card is Destroyed when played or discarded.
skill_description_12300417:
Consumes #r of Suen's current HP and waves the Scarlet Glass, enabling her normal attacks to:
Heal all allies except Suen for #r of their Max HP over #r seconds. This duration can be stacked.
After the duration ends, her normal attacks will return to the original ones.
Generates a Black card 'Reverengy' in your hand.
When this card is discarded, generates a Shadowcraft in your hand.
Suen's initial normal attacks are:
Deal damage to all enemies once and restore Suen's HP by #r.
skill_description_12300419: Activates the Scarlet Glass <color=#7AB2FF>Purification</color> mode and <color=#7AB2FF>Purifies</color> all allies.\nRestores 30% of Max HP for all allies.\nDestroys all Black cards in your hand. For each card Destroyed, restores 10% of Max HP for all allies.
skill_description_12300447: 'Check this out!'\nBox searches for a mini arsenal.\nRandomly generates a Pistol, Assault Rifle, or Burning Grenade in your hand.
skill_description_12300448: 'Life tastes good.'\nBox makes a drink.\nRandomly generates a card: Special Black Tea, Instant Protein Powder, or Mint Puff Icy.
skill_description_12300449: 'I will be back!'\nBox self-terminates and generates #r Disk Repair in your deck.
skill_description_12300461: 'It's always bad when it rains at night.' Begins emergency repairs, gaining Poise for the next #r seconds. During this period, restores #r% of Max HP per second. This character cannot use skills during this period.
skill_description_12300464: 'Hope for the best, prepare for the worst.'\nReinforces the divine shield, increasing this character's Max HP by #r and Defense by #r.
skill_description_12300465: 'Come at me!'\nEnters the Taking a Hit mode, reducing this character's incoming damage by #r for #r seconds.\nDuring this period, Taunts all enemies in the frontline and Interrupts them. After this period, the Taunt effect ends.
skill_description_12300466: 'Let's go! Keep it coming!'\nActivates the Super Tough Mode, reducing incoming damage by #r for #r seconds.\nDuring this period, taunts all enemies and Interrupts them, and enemies will attack only this character. The taunt effect ends when the duration expires.
skill_description_12300515: “Monday, the big sleep'.” Falls Asleep. Summons the familiar Monday in front of her. The familiar will not be attacked by enemies. Mechanic Wolves are called upon to aid in battle. They perform normal attacks for 10 seconds before being recalled.
While Active:
Whenever a Red card is played or discarded, the Mechanic Wolves launch a Wolf's Tooth Missile, dealing damage to enemies once and <color=#FFB800>Electrifying</color> them.
Whenever a Blue card is played or discarded, the Mechanic Wolves launch a Healing Bomb, restoring 6% of the target ally's HP.
Wolf's Tooth Missile is considered Explosive.
Mechanic Wolves are considered Mechanical Units.
skill_leaderCardConditionDesc_12302948: Cooldown: 30 seconds. Whenever you obtain an Explosive or Mechanical card, reduces the cooldown by 3 seconds.
skill_description_12302957: Launches #r Sticky Bombs onto random enemies, lasting for #r seconds.\nDuring this period, deals damage to enemies over #r hits per second and has a #r chance to randomly <color=#FF6666>Interrupt</color>, <color=#FF6666>Stun</color>, or <color=#FF6666>Ignite</color> them.\nSticky Bombs are considered Explosive.
skill_description_12302336: Draws a card and immediately replenishes Mana equal to the card's cost over time.
skill_description_12302337:
Summons the familiar Comet Tail Princess in front of the target ally. Comet Tail Princess cannot be targeted by enemy attacks.
Comet Tail Princess absorbs 20% of the damage taken by the target ally, triggering once every 5 seconds, and <color=#7AB2FF>Purifies</color> the ally and reflects all damage absorbed during the past 5 seconds.
Comet Tail Princess's Attack is equal to Olivienne's Attack.
Comet Tail Princess is considered a Familiar and her normal attacks can synergize with Freeze.
This card can only be used on one ally at a time and the next time it is used, Comet Tail Princess will follow the target ally.
When used on the same target repeatedly:
Comet Tail Princess receives an enhancement, absorbing an additional 20% of the damage taken by the target ally for 15 seconds.
skill_description_12303020:
Summons the Tea Crystal Dragon and inflicts <color=#B383FF>Crystalization</color> on all enemies for 10 seconds.
During this period:
The Tea Crystal Dragon deals randomized fire and frost damage to all enemies twice every second.
Whenever an enemy is hit by fire or frost damage, they gain a stack of Heat Stress or Cold Shrinkage.
For every 4 stacks of Heat Stress and Cold Shrinkage on an enemy, they generate a Crystal Cluster.
Each Crystal Cluster on the target increases the chance of taking double damage by 5%, up to 6 clusters.
Upon expiration, the Crystal Clusters Burst, dealing randomized fire and frost damage to enemies once.
The Tea Crystal Dragon is considered a Tamer.
The Tea Crystal Dragon's Attack is equal to Olivien's Attack.
skill_description_12303021: Deals physical damage to random enemies over 3 hits and <color=#FF6666>Slashes</color> them.
skill_description_12303015: Draws a card, prioritizing the ones with Familiar. Instantly restores Mana equal to the cost of the drawn card based on the number of natural Mana recovery.\nAlso extends the duration of the next Familiar with a time limit by an equal amount of time.
skill_description_12302348: This card is not for use. Whenever a Red card is drawn, reduces this card's cost by 1. After this effect is triggered 20 times, obliterates the card and bestows the status of Prisoner on all allies and removes the status of Caged Beast from the enemies.\nPrisoner: Increases Max HP by 1000% and reduces all healing received by 500%. This effect cannot be dispelled.

skill_description_12303071:
Summons a Tribun to gaze upon the target, inflicting 1 stack of <color=#B383FF>Focusing</color> and <color=#B383FF>Confusion</color>.
Tribun is considered a Familiar and her basic attacks have a chance to inflict Freeze. In addition, she absorbs damage on behalf of Lian.
Tribun's Attack and Defense are equal to Lian's Attack and Defense, and her HP is equal to 25% of Lian's HP. Up to 5 Tribun can be summoned.
When Tribun dies, she deals damage to the target once based on the number of <color=#B383FF>Focusing</color> stacks and inflicts <color=#FF6666>Heartburn</color>.
If there are 5 Tribun in play, this card's effect is changed to: Restores all Tribun's HP and inflicts 1 stack of <color=#B383FF>Focusing</color> and <color=#B383FF>Confusion</color> on the target.

The first time you deal Electrification, Triggering Lightning, Thunder Blast, and Overhead Blast increases Electric Element by 1, 2, 3, and 5.
The first time you deal Ignition, Searing Earth, Prairie Blaze, and Sea of Fire increases Fire Element by 1, 2, 4, and 8.
The first time you deal Chill, Freezing, and Encase increases Ice Element by 1, 3, and 6.
For every 10 Electric Element accumulated, generates a Lightning Nova in your hand.
For every 10 Fire Element accumulated, generates a Fire Nova in your hand.
For every 10 Ice Element accumulated, generates a Frost Nova in your hand.
For every 100 Element accumulated, triggers Overhead Blast, Prairie Blaze, and Encase on the enemy with the highest HP once.

break_desc_12100768: While Oxygen-Rich Atmosphere is in effect, whenever this character <color=#FF6666>Ignites</color> an enemy, gains 0.1 Mana.
break_desc_12100770: Each time a Drone is retrieved, this character gains +0.5% Attack, up to a maximum of 30%.
break_desc_12100772: Whenever a Heartburning Embers is Destroyed, increases all backline allies' Attack by 1%, up to a maximum of 30%.
break_desc_12100774: When this character is <color=#7AB2FF>Invisibile</color>, unleashes Lightning Slice.
break_desc_12100776: Upon successfully <color=#7AB2FF>Evading</color> an attack, becomes <color=#7AB2FF>Invisible</color> for 3 seconds.
break_desc_12100778: Upon using Unfurl, randomly gains <color=#7AB2FF>Invulnerability</color>, <color=#7AB2FF>Poise</color>, or <color=#7AB2FF>Invisibility</color> for 2 seconds.
break_desc_12100780: Every second, allies healed by a Flower's Sight gain a 0.2% Attack bonus, up to a maximum of 30%.\nEvery second, allies protected by a Moon's Insight gain a 0.1% Defense bonus, up to a maximum of 30%.
break_desc_12100782: Whenever you have an Explosive card in your hand, enemies deal 3% less final damage.
break_desc_12100784: Kabane Power grants all allies a +3% bonus to Attack and Defense, up to a maximum of 30%.
break_desc_12100785: Kabane Power grants all allies a +3% bonus to Attack and Defense, up to a maximum of 30%.
break_desc_12100788: When allies use their FINALE card or when an ally uses their leader skill, Disaster Moon is triggered. In addition, <color=#FF6666>Slashing</color> inflicted by this character deals 10% more damage, up to a maximum of 100%.
break_desc_12100790: Whenever a Nova is generated, this character regains 0.5 Mana.
break_desc_12100792: Generates a Darksteel Slash at the beginning of each battle.\nWhile Darksteel Slash is in your hand, destroys all Black cards and Shadowcrafts in your hand. For each card Destroyed, Darksteel Slash deals 10% more damage, up to a maximum of 200%.
break_desc_12100794: Using the leader skill directly triggers a Star Arc.
break_desc_12100796: Each time <color=#FF6666>Corruption</color> is inflicted, this character gains a 1% Attack bonus, up to a maximum of 30%.
break_desc_12100798: Whenever this character <color=#7AB2FF>Freezes</color> an enemy, increases this character's Attack by 1%, up to 50%.
break_desc_12100800: When any ally is <color=#7AB2FF>Invisible</color>, directly launches a Tactical Missile.
break_desc_12100804: Whenever a Drone is retrieved, strikes the enemy with the highest HP with <color=#FFB800>Thunder Blast</color> and has a 10% chance to trigger <color=#FFB800>Overhead Blast</color>.
break_desc_12100806: For each card retrieved, increases this character's Attack and Defense by 1%, up to 50%.
break_desc_12100808: While New Tune is in effect, all allies take 10% less final damage.
break_desc_12100810: Whenever a card is discarded, this character gains +0.3% Attack, up to a maximum of 30%.
break_desc_12100812: Using the Discard action heals all allies for 5% of their Max HP for each card discarded.
break_desc_12100814: When the F.V. accumulates over 200,000, Mega Magnetic Wave deals 20% more damage.\nWhen the F.V. accumulates over 500,000, Mega Magnetic Wave deals 30% more damage.
break_desc_12100816: After this character <color=#FFB800>Electrifies</color> enemies 30 times, the next normal attack will trigger <color=#FFB800>Thunder Blast</color> on every hit.\nIn addition, increases this character's Attack by 100 for 6 seconds.
break_desc_12100818: When Chained Lightning detonates, it deals double damage with a 33% chance.\nWhen this effect is triggered, there is a 33% chance to upgrade the effect triggered by Multiple Ammunition to <color=#FFB800>Thunder Blast</color>, <color=#FF6666>Searing Earth</color>, or <color=#7AB2FF>Encase in Ice</color>.
break_desc_12100821:
Enhances Summer Memories:
Shuffles all the cards in your hand into the deck.
Reduces this card's cost based on the shuffles' total cost.
Draws a number of cards equal to all shuffled cards.
Restores allies' HP based on all shuffled cards'.
Increases all allies' Attack and Defense by 3%. This effect stacks.
This card is Destroyed when played.
break_desc_12100822: Formless has a 33% chance to inflict a random type of The Eight Sufferings on the target.\nFor each status inflicted, Formless: Turning Wheel deals 12% more damage.\nThe Eight Sufferings: Birth, Aging, Illness, Death, the Suffering of Grudge, the Suffering of Parting, the Suffering of Unfulfilled Wish, the Suffering of the Five Aggregates.
break_desc_12100824: For each Mechanical unit on the battlefield, your Mechanical units deal 5% more final damage.
break_desc_12100826: Better better better'\nWhenever an ally is <color=#FF6666>Berserk</color>, restores 0.02 Mana per second.
break_desc_12100828: When Snowshade Birches imitates Swimmed Swim, Dusk Direphant, or Glacial Spine Dragon, increases all frontline, midline, and backline allies' Attack by 80 for 6 seconds.
break_desc_12100829: Whenever an Explosive is destroyed, restores 0.15 Mana.
break_desc_12100830: Increases the number of shots of Mechanical Wolf by 1.
break_desc_12100833: Each Machine Wolf summoned reduces incoming damage by 12% for all allies. This effect stacks.\nUpon using the leader skill or playing the signature skill card, becomes <color=#7AB2FF>Invisible</color> and additionally summons a Machine Wolf for 5 seconds.
break_desc_12100835: Enemies with Sticky Bomb attached take 25% more damage from other explosive effects.\nWhen an Amplification reaction is triggered, Explosive holders gain +1% Attack, up to a maximum of 50%.
break_desc_12100838: When Comet Sakura is followed, all allied units deal 20% more final damage.
break_desc_12100837: Cards drawn with Tea Time Law increase this cardholder's Attack by 3%, up to a maximum of 60%.
break_desc_12100840: Increases the maximum number of Crystal Clusters by 4.
break_desc_12100841: At higher levels of Heat Stress and Cold Shrink Force, enemies take more fire and ice damage, up to a maximum of 50%.
break_desc_12100842: Whenever this character becomes Invisible, grants Berserk to themselves and their Familiar.\nWhenever this character enters Berserk, removes a stack of Suppression.
break_desc_12100843: Every time this character inflicts Berserk, Corruption, Critical Injury, Confusion, Heartburn, or Gaze, increases this character's Attack by 0.5%, up to a maximum of 60%.
break_desc_12100846: For each Threnodic Crow on the battlefield, restores 0.1 Mana per second. This effect stacks.
break_desc_12100847: Upon using 3 of this character's skill cards, draws a card and removes a number of Suppression equal to the cost of the drawn card.
break_desc_12100849: Whenever an Elemental Nova, Supernova, or Strange Spark is generated, this character gains +3% Attack, up to a maximum of 99%.
break_desc_12100850: While Morsus exists, whenever a Nova, Elemental Nova, Supernova, or Strange Spark is Destroyed, directly plays a Nova, Elemental Nova, Supernova, or Strange Spark.
break_desc_12100852:
While Mörs exists:
Reduced cost by 1 for Nova and Elemental Nova.
Reduced cost by 2 for Supernova and Strange Spark.
Reduced cost by 3 for Primordial Light.
break_desc_12100853: All allied Familiars deal 20% more damage. Additionally, each existing Familiar increases damage by 5%.
talent_desc_12800015: When an ally's Shield expires or is triggered, restores 5% of the Shield holder's Max HP.
talent_desc_12800032: Using Plumed Feather reduces this character's Defense by 5% but increases Attack by 15% for 10 seconds.
talent_desc_12800059: When this character is directly healed by another character, restores an additional 10% of Max HP and increases Attack by 1%, up to a maximum of 30%.\nThis effect does not trigger for heal-over-time effects.
talent_desc_12800060: When HP falls below 60%/30%, restores 30% of Max HP. This effect can only be triggered once for each threshold.
talent_desc_12800097: Healing Bolt and Explosive Flame Bomb have a 30% chance to be triggered once more.
talent_desc_12800099: When discarding cards using the Discard action, retrieves a Strong Recovery Bullet from the discard pile to your hand.
talent_desc_12800181: Reduces the cost of Pistol, Assault Rifle, Incendiary Grenade, and Pager by 1.
talent_desc_12800193: Enhances Dreamweaving:\n'What dream should I make today?' and falls into <color=#B383FF>Sleep</color>.\nSelects a card from Night of Terror, Requiem, Mana Spring, and Star Dream Connection and adds the selected card to your hand.
talent_desc_12800235: While Electroflash is active, Rolling Thunder strikes once more.
talent_desc_12800323:
Enhances Riddle:
Activates the Box of Deconstruction. Shuffles all cards in your hand into the deck, and draws 3 cards.
Generates Constructive Flame equal to the number of Red cards shuffled in your hand.
Generates Disintegrating Thunder equal to the number of Yellow cards shuffled in your hand.
Generates Reconstructive Power equal to the number of Blue cards shuffled in your hand.
Generates Reverengy equal to the number of Green cards shuffled in your hand.
Generates <color=#7AB2FF>Purifying Light</color> equal to the number of Purple cards shuffled in your hand.
talent_desc_12800330: Make a better place'\nWhenever you play a Red card, heals for 8% of Max HP.
talent_desc_12800313: Hayate's normal attacks and Impermanence gain the ability to <color=#FF6666>Ricochet</color>.\nEnemies affected by <color=#FF6666>Heartburn</color> or <color=#FF6666>Ignition</color> take 100% more <color=#FF6666>Rending</color> or <color=#FF6666>Slash</color> damage.
talent_desc_12800352: Enhances Microwave:\nDeploys a 303 Drone that emits microwave for 5 seconds. During this period, restores the allies with the lowest HP for 10% of their Max HP and <color=#FF6666>Ignites</color> a random enemy every second.\nThe 303 Drone is considered Unmanned.
talent_desc_12800374: <color=#FFB800>Electrification</color> and <color=#FFB800>Thunderfall</color> inflicted by the leader deal 50% more <color=#FFB800>lightning</color> damage. <color=#FFB800>Thunder Blast</color> and <color=#FFB800>Overhead Blast</color> deal 100% more <color=#FFB800>lightning</color> damage.
talent_desc_12800222: Don't let me down'\nWhenever you obtain a Purple card or use Chaotic Cannon MEGA, Judy launches 2 Corn Bombs, each dealing damage to a random enemy once and inflicting <color=#FF6666>Cacophony</color>.\nCorn Bombs are considered Explosive.
talent_desc_12800223: Upon Your Shoulders': Whenever your deck runs out of cards and is shuffled, Judy launches a flare and generates a Rampage at the bottom of your deck.
talent_desc_12800224: Hey Jude'\nShire's good buddy Jude comes to aid the battle.
talent_desc_12800225: Whenever Chaotic Cannon MEGA is used, Judy launches a Healing Bomb that heals the ally with the lowest HP for 10% of their Max HP.\nIn addition, adds one of this character's skill cards from the deck or discard pile to your hand.
talent_desc_12800078: After using Charge, draws a card, prioritizing this character's skill cards.
talent_desc_12800083: Penetrating Shot and Burst Shot have a 30% chance to launch once more.
talent_desc_12800084: Starts with a Black Potion at the bottom of your deck.
talent_desc_12800090: Whenever your deck runs out of cards and is shuffled, draws a Charge from the deck to your hand.\nDrains 10% of the target ally's current HP and increases this character's final damage dealt by 35%.\nIn addition, gains <color=#FF6666>Berserk</color> and <color=#7AB2FF>Poise</color> for 12 seconds.
talent_desc_12800111: 20% chance to evade incoming attacks.\nUpon a successful evasion, gains 0.5 Mana.
talent_desc_12800119: Whenever your deck runs out of cards and is shuffled, draws a Butterfly Dance from the deck into your hand.\nHeals the ally with the highest HP for 10% of their current HP and increases this character's final damage dealt by 35%.\nThis character gains <color=#FF6666>Berserk</color> and <color=#7AB2FF>Poise</color> for 12 seconds.
talent_desc_12800121: After using Butterfly Dance, all Butterfly Dance used in this battle strike 2 more times, stacking up to 6 times.\nAfter using Demon Dance, the next Floating Linkage inflicted 50% more damage. This effect stacks.
talent_desc_12800124: After using Butterfly Dance, adds a Demon Dance from the deck to your hand.\nAfter using Demon Dance, adds a Butterfly Dance from the deck to your hand.
talent_desc_12800132: The second version of the Golden Dig obtains the FINALE YOUR DOW! Energy skill.\nFINALE YOUR DOW!: Throws 3 mining tools, each dealing damage to a random enemy once and <color=#FF6666>Stunning</color> them. In addition, randomly obtains 1 to 3 coins.
talent_desc_12800136: When Goldiver II is near death, it enters a Paralyzed state and cannot take action, while restoring 10% of its Max HP per second for 10 seconds. During this period, <color=#7AB2FF>Goljder II is Invulnerable</color>.\nAfter the duration ends, Goldiver II exits the Paralyzed state.
talent_desc_12800140: Summons a Diggin' II at the beginning of each battle. The Diggin' II inherits the properties of Ms. Gold.\nDiggin' II is considered a Mechanical Unit.
talent_desc_12800144: When Subaru Seven disappears, generates a Nova in your hand.
talent_desc_12800148: Whenever there is a Black card in your deck or hand, restores 0.05 Mana per second.\nWhenever Reverengy is drawn from your deck, retrieves a card from the discard pile to your hand.
talent_desc_12800152:
Enhances Seven Sisters: Summons Seven Sisters for 8 seconds. During this period:
Using a Red card unleashes a microwave pulse, dealing damage to the target once and inflicting <color=#FF6666>Ignition</color>.
Using a Yellow card triggers an electromagnetic pulse, striking the target once and causing <color=#FFB800>Thunderfall</color>.
Using a Purple card releases a neutrino pulse, dealing damage to the target once and inflicting <color=#FF6666>Eradication</color>.
Seven Sisters is considered a Mechanical Unit.
Microwave Pulse, Electromagnetic Pulse, and Neutrino Pulse are all classified as Waves.
After use, generates a Black card 'Reverengy' at the bottom of your deck.
talent_desc_12800156: Using Nova recovers 0.1 Mana per second for 8 seconds.\nUsing Supernova recovers 0.5 Mana per second for 8 seconds.
talent_desc_12800128:
Ushana has a Fury limit of 250.
Using Slash! gains 10 Fury. Whenever Ushana kills an enemy, also gains 10 Fury.
Whenever an ally inflicts <color=#FF6666>Slashing</color>, gains 1 Fury.
When Fury reaches 50/150/250, Slash! additionally <color=#FF6666>Slashes</color> enemies 1-2/1-3/1-5 times.
talent_desc_12800244: Enhances Slash!:\nWields the Split Sky, dealing damage to enemies once and <color=#FF6666>Slashing</color> them 1 to 3 times.\nRandomly triggers <color=#B383FF>Imprisonment</color> or <color=#B383FF>Fetter</color>.
talent_desc_12800248: Whenever there's a Black card in your deck or hand, restores 1% of Max HP per second.\nWhenever Enerengy Retrival is drawn from your deck, adds a Slash! from your deck or discard pile to your hand.\nUnleashes a Sky Rending that pierces through enemies, dealing damage once and inflicting <color=#FF6666>Gravage</color>.
talent_desc_12800256: Attacks by this character have a 20% chance to inflict <color=#FF6666>Corrosion</color> in addition to <color=#FF6666>Slashing</color>.
talent_desc_12800283: While Stigmata is active, restores 0.1 Mana per second.
talent_desc_12800306: Upon using Stigmata, gains the Astral's Veil for 6 seconds.\nDuring this period, per second, <color=#FF6666>Eradicates</color> a nearby enemy and heals this character for the damage dealt.\nDuring this period, whenever Stigmata Disintegration occurs, extends the duration by 1 second.
talent_desc_12800311: Upon drawing Prologue, draws 1-2 cards, prioritizing this character's skill cards.
talent_desc_12800329: Whenever Torture is drawn, restores 1-2 Mana.
talent_desc_12800572: Upon encountering a new wave of enemies, releases Phantasmic Gas.
talent_desc_12800573:
Enhances Adhesive Bombs:
Launches 3 Adhesive Bombs on random enemies, sticking them for 5 seconds.
During this period, deals damage to the targets once per second and has a 50% chance to <color=#FF6666>Interrupt</color>, <color=#FF6666>Stun</color>, or <color=#FF6666>Ignite</color> the targets.
Adhesive Bombs are considered Explosive.
talent_desc_12800574: When <Marsh Gas> is discarded to the discard pile, it is considered played.\nUpon using Marsh Gas, grants <color=#7AB2FF>Invisibility</color> to all backline allies for 5 seconds.
talent_desc_12800576:
Psychedelic Gas' duration:
Reduces all frontline allies' final damage taken by 25%.
Grants all friendly Mechanical units <color=#FF6666>Berserk</color>.
Increases all backline allies' final damage dealt by 25%.
talent_desc_12800571: Enhances Tea Time Rule:\nDraws a card, prioritizing the ones with Familiar tag. Instantly restores Mana equal to the cost of the drawn card over time.\nThe next Familiars you summon have their duration extended by the same amount of time.
talent_desc_12800578: Using Tea Time Law gains an additional 0.5 Mana for each Familiar on the battlefield.
talent_desc_12800580: When a Crystal Cluster is generated, heals all allies for 3% of their Max HP.
talent_desc_12800581: Teal Crystal Dragon's Attack Speed is doubled.
talent_desc_12800583:
Gains +200 Attack and stacks 10 layers of Suppression at the beginning.
Each layer of Suppression reduces this character's Attack by 20. This effect stacks up to 10 times.
Whenever Ren uses Cracking or Black Feathers, removes a layer of Suppression. When all layers of Suppression are removed, Ren enters the Berserk state.
During the Berserk state, continuously consumes 1% of Max HP per second. Ren cannot use Cracking or Black Feathers, and her normal attacks are replaced by Shattered Bones. Whenever Shattered Bones is triggered, stacks 2 layers of Suppression.
When Suppression reaches 10 layers,解除 Berserk state.
talent_desc_12800584: While Virtual Psyche is active, each level of <color=#B383FF>Foresight</color> causes enemies to take 3% more final damage, up to a maximum of 30%.
talent_desc_12800585: For each level of Suppression removed, restores 20% of the HP of the lowest HP Lenya.\nFor every 10 levels of Suppression, adds a Black Feather from your deck or graveyard to your hand.
talent_desc_12800586:
Enhances Virtual Insight:
Generates the Virtual Insight for 6 seconds.
During this period:
Grants <color=#7AB2FF>Invisibility</color> to all allied Familiars and this character.
Allies with <color=#7AB2FF>Invisibility</color> deal 50% more final damage.
When this character is in Berserk mode, discards all Crackle in your hand.
When this character is not in Berserk mode, add up to 3 Crackles from your deck or discard pile to your hand based on the number of Raven at the frontline.
talent_desc_12800399: Enhances Priestess:\nGenerates Star, Moon, and Sun. Choose one to add to your hand, and place the other two back into your deck.\nDetermine the orientation of the selected card. If it's in the upright position, the next attack used by the player deals 50% more damage. If it's in the reversed position, the cost of the next skill used by the player is reduced by 1.
talent_desc_12800414: For every Nova generated, all Towers summoned this battle gain +1 effective use, up to a maximum of 6 times.
talent_desc_12800588: During the duration of Star, Moon, and Sun, restores all allies' HP by 3% per second.
talent_desc_12800589: Using Destiny's Wheel generates a Strange Spark in your hand. This card generation can exceed your hand limit.\nWhen Elemental Tower and Meurs co-exist, if you have Supernova and Strange Spark in your hand, they will be automatically fused into Primordial Light, and this fusion can also exceed your hand limit.

equip_des_11800049: Armor created by Night Chains for special combat personnel. While the Empire sees this armor as a product of 'magic,' its principles are fundamentally different from those of the Empire.
equip_des_11800050: Another artifact from Night Chains collection, it has not been detected for any magical traces or morphic field anomalies, and once was considered a mere ordinary craft. However, whenever its owner is in mortal danger, it miraculously brings the owner out of peril. After that, the jade always inexplicably cracks, and each time it is repaired as if restoring an artifact.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800051: Struck by lightning for lying, hence able to increase the chance of attracting lightning.
equip_des_11800054: A technological artifact from the Earth Union's Golden Age, designed to maximize the safety of its wearer. The current B.C.R.A. has lost the ability to produce such finely crafted armor.
equip_des_11800056: Armor used by a Night Chains defector, with the Black Moon symbol on it defaced, symbolizing its former owner's resistance against Night Chains. If the former owner was a powerful Ascender, this intent might be retained upon the armor, leading to unexpected effects.
equip_Getway_11800056_0_DisplayName: CDCA Bureau Agency Flying Serpent Rewards Quest
equip_des_11800058: Material Resisting Secret Arts from Empire Research
equip_des_11800059: For the Sages of the Citadel, knowledge is life. Therefore, preserving knowledge is equivalent to preserving one's own life. To achieve this, they created devices to store their memories and knowledge externally, ensuring that even if their bodies sustain fatal injuries, their consciousness and knowledge will not perish along with them.
equip_des_11800060: A strange, amorphous fossil of unknown origin, containing a complete galaxy that is still operational. After ultrahigh magnification, the trajectories of the stars within the galaxy can be observed.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_des_11800061: The brilliance of the Wishing Tower does not come from the sun. According to the statements of Earth Union scientists, its starlight originates from a B-type star. Scholars from the Empire, having conducted more in-depth research, believe that the Wishing Tower's star is accompanied by a companion star, which serves as the source of power for creating a magical staff.
equip_des_11800062: A weapon created by Night Chains for special combat personnel, it bears a resemblance to the magical technology of the ancient Harmonica Dragon. It's unclear whether Night Chains replicated the technology from the ancient artifact or if the craftsmanship for creating this weapon has never been lost.
equip_Getway_11800062_0_DisplayName: CDCA Bureau Agency Flying Serpent Rewards Quest
equip_des_11800064: Originally used in the Reality Stabilizer for emergency cooling, it was later repurposed by security personnel during emergencies for riot control. It was discovered that it could embrittle metals, proving particularly effective against civilian armor in combat situations.
equip_des_11800065: Created by Citadel Guide Codex Niktal, this device allegedly holds the answer to the ultimate question of the universe as understood by Niktal. However, it has only been found to eliminate all life within its range.
equip_des_11800066: Researcher at ANITA conducted a study on ball lightning, leading to the conclusion that it is not an ordinary discharge phenomenon, but rather related to the wave function collapse of fundamental particles. It can unpredictably disrupt the structure of matter and even interact at the fundamental particle level. The prototype was discovered and confiscated by the Citadel.
equip_des_11800020: Residents of highly polluted areas wear armor made from dragon bones after hunting skeleton dragons. Not only does it counter chaos tree creatures, but it also has a deterrent effect against thugs in the wilderness.
equip_des_11800067: A phenomenon discovered by the scholarly acoustitics research of the Citadel, demonstrating how vibration frequency affects the standing wave patterns on a vibrating surface. Later, a similar phenomenon was observed in the study of morhphic resonance, where this device modulates the user's morphic field for maximum effectiveness.
equip_des_11800027: A retrieval device from the Written Maze, with the central stone slab believed to originate from the will of the maze itself, salvaged by the scholars of the Citadel.
equip_des_11800068: Powerful exoskeleton designed by Night Chains for special combat operatives, capable of greatly enhancing both defensive capabilities and strength. This design philosophy may contradict Night Chains' usual emphasis on stealth, but even Night Chains encounters formidable foes that necessitate such power.
equip_Getway_11800068_0_DisplayName: CDCA Bureau Agency Flying Serpent Rewards Quest
equip_des_11800078: Upon entering the Mandus, the Empire faced a series of calamities: plague, famine, warfare, and harsh winters. Eventually, the Empire triumphed over these adversities and created this amulet, symbolizing the sealing of the fourfold disasters. While magic wasn't the sole means of overcoming these challenges, the amulet's significance imbues it with unique magical power.

When the target is affected by Hypnosis, each stack of Mental Pollution has a 20% chance to randomly trigger Confusion, Corruption, Sleep, or Heartburn, up to 5 layers.

In addition, inflicts <color=#B383FF>Confusion</color>.\nDraws a card, prioritizing to the Purple ones.\nDiscards all the Seedcore in your hand, and for each Seedcore discarded, draws an extra card.
skill_description_12302011: Increases this character's Attack by 5% of the highest Defense ally's Defense at the beginning of each battle. When this character takes damage, transfers 25% of the damage taken to the highest Defense ally.

skill_description_12303434:
Summons the starry familiar Mirrs to battle for 9 seconds.
During this period:
Mirrs unleashes a rippling wave that penetrates enemies, dealing damage to all enemies once and slashing them every second.
When Star, Moon, Sun, or Tower is in effect, Mirrs gains a 50% Attack Speed bonus, capped at 200%.
Mirrs' attacks alternate between Frost, Flame, and EM.
Each time he deals damage, he inflicts either Chill, Prairie Scorch, or Thunder Blast.
Mirrs is considered a Familiar.
Mirrs' Attack is based on Margiela Astrolabe's Attack.
Rippling Wave is considered a Wave.
skill_leaderCardConditionDesc_12303434: Cooldown: 35 seconds. Whenever a Nova, Elemental Nova, or Stange Spark is generated, reduces the cooldown by 5 seconds. Whenever this character's skill card is obtained, reduces the cooldown by 10 seconds.
skill_description_12303440: Under the sunlight of Sirius, gains 1 Mana per second for #r seconds.\nDuring this period, triggers Thunder Blast once per second on the enemy with the highest HP.\nThis card is Destroyed when played. In addition, generates a Nova in your hand.
skill_description_12303441: Conjures a moon that pulls all enemies together and Freeze them for #r seconds.\nDuring this period, deals damage to all enemies once per second and Inflicts Chill.\nThis card is Destroyed when played, and generates a Nova in your hand.
skill_description_12303442: Releases a solar wheel that damages enemies once per second and triggers Prairie Blaze for #r seconds.\nThis card is Destroyed when played. In addition, generates a Nova in your hand.
skill_description_12303463: Max HP +5%. For each Totem on the battlefield, this character takes 5% less final damage, up to a maximum of 35%.
skill_description_12303462: Orange cards deal 50% more damage. For each card in the discard pile, deal 1% more damage.

skill_description_12303466: When any ally's HP falls below 50%, grants them 5 seconds of Cloak. This effect can only be triggered once per ally. When triggered, all ally Familiars deal 5% more damage (up to 25% more).
skill_description_12303478: Generates Star, Moon, and Sun. Selects one of them to add to your hand, and returns the other two to your deck.
skill_description_12303482: Orange cards deal 50% more damage. For each card in the discard pile, deal 1% more damage.

equip_des_11800079: This wand is made from mysterious creature's feather, rumored to have immense power. It is said that a male counterpart wand exists in the world, and when the two wands meet, they lose their power.\n[This equipment is unique.]

equip_des_11800080: A crystal with magical powers. It is said that the holder of this crystal can draw endless strength from it, leading to misconceptions that it possesses healing and even resurrection abilities.\n[This equipment is unique.]
equip_Getway_11800080_0_DisplayName: Snowdel City – City Reputation Level 15 Rewards
equip_des_11800081: A versatile protective gear for familiars, providing comprehensive protection for familiars of various sizes and shapes. Small ones can snuggle inside, while larger ones can wear it on the outside!
tag_detail_12601698: Applies 1 stack of Frostbite to the target. Each stack of Frostbite increases the target's final damage taken/dealt by 3%, lasting for 6 seconds.\nWhen Frostbite is stacked to 3 layers, triggers Shattered Ice, dealing damage to the target once, in addition to Encasement and removing all Frostbite stacks.
